text:
mSIGNIA,Inc.- Nashville TN $90K - $125K Provides Equity Hiring a Senior iOS Engineer for Mobile Security

http://careers.stackoverflow.com/jobs/105688/senior-ios-engi...

We are radically changing how people authenticate on mobile devices (no username or passwords!) in one of the fastest growing mobile technologies, Mobile Payments. mSIGNIA's app security platform was patented in 2011 and designed specifically to secure mobile apps, with both the end user and the app creator in mind.
